title: Company News For Sep 4, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Conn's, Inc.'s   CONN    shares rose 18.3% after the company reported second quarter   fiscal 2020 earnings per share of $0.62, surpassing the Zacks   Consensus Estimate of $0.51 The Medicines Company's   MDCO    shares gained 10.4% after the company reported positive results   from its ORION-11 trial at ESC Congress 2019. Shares of Emergent BioSolutions Inc.   EBS    surged 14.5% after the company received a 10-year HHS contract to   provide ACAM2000 smallpox vaccines to the U.S. Strategic National   Stockpile Shares of Royal Caribbean Cruises Ltd.   RCL    fell 1.4% afterthe reorts surfaced that the company could suffer   losses of up to $0.05 a share in the current quarter due to the   impact of Hurricane Dorian    Want the latest recommendations from Zacks Investment Research?
